amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of Compliance by $467,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 112-173 to reduce funding for the Office of Compliance to the FY 2008 level ($467,000 reduction) and transfers the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
